Hello! This is MD Mejbah Ur Rahman Sowad. I am an adventurous guy who is always looking forward to new challenges in life. I am a person who loves to deal with puzzles and maths and not really a fan of memorizing. I like to travel or watch anime during my leisure time. I am a fast learner and can adapt with people well. I like to smile and make people around me smile.

Projects

Project 1 of 3: Temployee

A freelancing website, especially for freshers. Using Temployee an organisation can also hire people to complete tasks. The website is developed with react and ASP .NET

Project 2 of 3: HOPE

An android app build to help the mentally challenged or depressed people. It is designed to reduce the mental stress of a person to make their life easier. It was developed with java and firebase using android studio.

Project 3 of 3: Transport Management System

A database management system built to keep records of vehicles and staff. The audience of the system are the transportation companies. MongoDB was used as the database and it was developed in intellij.
